Reviews.Title: Not a 6mm lens, as specified in description.
Reviews.Author: THOMAS O HOSKINS
Reviews.Content: Camera was fine but it actually has a 3.6mm lens and not a 6mm lens as specified on website.Wouldn't work for my application, so I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Dan Pelka
Reviews.Content: I got these (4 of them) to replace some older ones which had less IR LEDs and less definition. I've looked around, and with these specs, and for the price, these can't be beat! Additionally, I didn't even need to mount the enclosed mounts/brackets, because these cameras fit right onto my old brackets. The cameras work great! The night vision looks almost like daylight! I highly recommend.

ProductInfo.Features:
IP66 Water Resistant
1/3-Inch Sony SuperHAD CCD Sensor with 540TVL resolution
42 IR LEDs provide viewing up to 105ft in complete darkness
Weather-resistant with flexible wall- or ceiling-mount bracket
Power adapter and video cable not included
ProductInfo.Name: LTS LTCMR6016HB-CM 540TVL 1/3-Inch Sony SuperHAD CCD Night Vision Camera with 42iR / 6mm Fixed Lens Black
